text: 8|7|Arau smarana karaa, yetiya allahe tomalokaka pratisrauti dichila ye, du'i dalara yikono eta dala tomalokara ayattadhina haba, athaca tomaloke bicaraichila ye, astrahina dalato tomalokara ayattadhina ha'omka, kintu allahe bicaraichila satyaka te'omra banira dbaraa pratisthita karaiba arau kaphirasakalaka nirmula karaiba.
